page.title: 05What are our houses like ?
page.content: The standard of housing throughout the area is very{good}and relatively {highly priced,}with a mixture of{old} and{new.}There are some exceptionally large houses. The vast majority are {privately owned}but a small number of {council houses}are to be found at Fiskerton and Rolleston. There is no special accomodation for the elderly or disabled. Many old buildings have been renovated and disused barns changed into homes. The planning authority and residents prefer this to new housing as it helps to preserve the character of the villages. It is also thought that too rapid a growth in village size would be bad and, because of this, it is now very difficult to obtain planning permission for new properties. There is little opportunity for most first time buyers.
